channel.title: Ed Zwick on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ed Zwick on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Ed Zwick to Direct Western Movie ‘The Creed of Violence’ (Exclusive)
item.description: The Oscar winner will work with creative partner Marshall Herskovitz on an adaptation of the 2009 novel that previously had names such as Leonardo DiCaprio and Daniel Craig attached.
